articles.title: Jaylen Brown seemingly criticizes officiating again following Celtics’ loss to Magic
articles.description:
"I think in the fourth quarter, I think the officials made their point."

The post Jaylen Brown seemingly criticizes officiating again following Celtics’ loss to Magic appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jaylen Brown criticized officiating after Celtics' 108-102 loss to Magic on November 7.
Brown stated officials 'made their point' during the crucial fourth quarter.
Celtics' fans express frustration over perceived bias affecting local team's performance.

articles.title: 5 things to know about Buccaneers ahead of Sunday’s game vs. Patriots
articles.description:
The Buccaneers are led by an MVP candidate at quarterback, but their defense might give the Patriots a tougher test.

The post 5 things to know about Buccaneers ahead of Sunday’s game vs. Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face Buccaneers on Sunday, November 10, 2025, at Gillette Stadium.
Buccaneers' quarterback is an MVP candidate, posing a significant challenge for the Patriots' defense.
Local fans expect a competitive game, impacting community engagement and local businesses.

articles.title: Patriots’ return to relevance includes appearance by Jim Nantz in TV booth to call game for CBS
articles.description:
Let’s just say Nantz hasn’t said, “Hello, friends,” to Patriots fans very often since the end of the team's dynasty. He and analyst Tony Romo last called a Patriots game in Week 6 of the 2023 season.

The post Patriots’ return to relevance includes appearance by Jim Nantz in TV booth to call game for CBS appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jim Nantz and Tony Romo called the Patriots game on CBS for the first time since Week 6.
Nantz's last appearance for a Patriots game reflects the team's struggle since their dynasty ended.
Patriots' improved performance may boost local fan engagement and viewership for future broadcasts.
